SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ConsoleColor
This enum defines various ANSI escape sequences for controlling text formatting in terminals, such as text color, background color, bold, underline, and high-intensity variations.
ConsoleInputReader
Implementation of the InputReaderInterface for reading input from the console.
ConsoleMenuPrinter
Implementation of MenuPrinterInterface for printing menu-related content to the console.
ConsoleProgressMeter
A class for displaying a terminal progress meter.
FileParser
Utility class for parsing files into collections and mappings.
InputReaderInterface
Interface for reading various types of input from the user.
Menu
Abstract class that represents a menu in an application.
MenuItem
Represents a menu item in a menu system.
MenuPrinterInterface
Interface that extends PrinterInterface to include a method for printing menu items.
PrinterInterface
Interface defining methods for printing various types of messages.
ReplacementMethod
Enum representing different replacement methods used for selecting a word from a list based on specific criteria.
ReplacementMethodSettingsMenu
Menu for configuring the replacement method in the WordReplacer.
ReplacementWordSet
A record representing a set of replacement words, implementing the ReplacementWordSetInterface.
ReplacementWordSetInterface
Interface for managing a set of replacement words.
Runner
The Runner class serves as the entry point for the application.
SettingsMenu
Abstract class representing a settings menu in an application.
SimilarityAlgorithm
Enum defining various similarity algorithms for comparing word embeddings.
SimilarityAlgorithmSettingsMenu
Menu for configuring the similarity algorithm used by the WordReplacer.
SimplifierMainMenu
Main menu for the Simplifier application.
SimplifierSettingsMenu
Represents the settings menu for the simplifier application, extending the functionality of WordReplacerSettingsMenu.
Vector
Utility class providing static methods for various vector operations such as addition, subtraction, dot product, Euclidean distance, and cosine similarity.
WordEmbedding
Record representing a word and its associated embedding.
WordEmbeddingMap
Record representing a map of words to their embeddings and implementing WordEmbeddingMapInterface.
WordEmbeddingMapInterface
Interface defining the structure and operations for managing a map of word embeddings.
WordEmbeddingSimilarity
Record representing a word and its similarity score, typically used for comparing words based on their embeddings.
WordReplacer
A class responsible for replacing words in a string based on a replacement set.
WordReplacerAbstract
An abstract class for replacing words in a text string based on word embeddings and a replacement word set.
WordReplacerSettingsMenu
Abstract class representing a settings menu for configuring WordReplacer settings.
